code: import{configureStore}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";import api from"../utils/api";import productsReducer from'./products/productsSlice';import userReducer from'./user/userSlice';import singleProductReducer from'./singleProduct/singleProductSlice';var store=configureStore({reducer:{products:productsReducer,user:userReducer,singleProduct:singleProductReducer},middleware:function middleware(getDefaultMiddleware){return getDefaultMiddleware({thunk:{extraArgument:api}});}});export default store;
